summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FinBank application. Authentication is now working correctly, but dashboard has critical rendering issues post-login.

resolved_issues.issue: Authentication integration fixed - alice@demo.com/password123 login now works
resolved_issues.evidence: Backend logs show successful login at 06:44:35

minor_issues.issue: Resend API key is restricted to only send emails
minor_issues.impact: Email notifications may fail, but doesn't affect core functionality

critical_bugs.issue: React error: 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'charAt')' at Dashboard.tsx:292:48
critical_bugs.impact: Dashboard fails to render after successful login, showing error boundary

csp_violations.issue: Content Security Policy blocking external resources
csp_violations.impact: External services not loading, but core app functionality works

ui_improvements.issue: Demo credentials clearly displayed - alice@demo.com/password123 and bob@demo.com/password123

passed_tests: Frontend application loads successfully at localhost:3000
Navigation to login page works correctly
Login form accepts credentials and submits properly
URL redirect from /login to /dashboard indicates successful login

success_percentage.backend: 90% - Authentication fixed, minor email service issue
success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Login works but dashboard rendering fails

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Dashboard component React error at line 292:48 - 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'charAt')'. Authentication is now working correctly, but users cannot access dashboard after login due to this rendering error. Also consider fixing CSP violations for external API access.
